common.label.title: Title
descriptionContainer.label.name: Marc Terradas Zapata
descriptionContainer.label.title: Senior Frontend Developer
descriptionContainer.message.description: +{yearsOfExperience} years of experience as a developer, focused on Frontend, with knowledge of Backend and DevOps. In the products I have worked on, I have provided great value, from the moment of planning to production release, thanks to teamwork and communication skills. I focus a lot on developing maintainable and scalable code, and dedicate a lot of time to review pull requests and testing.
educationContainer.label.daw: Associate degree, Development of web applications (CFGS - DAW)
educationContainer.label.title: Education
header.label.title: Marc Terradas Zapata
languagesContainer.label.title: Languages
workExperienceContainer.label.title: Work experience
workExperienceContainer.message.andyDesc: Andy is a B2B app that helps restaurants with food safety, and also develops projects for McDonald's.
workExperienceContainer.message.andyPart: Lead Andy's Frontend and Backend developments in the app (my.andyapp.io) and in the internal CRM (panel.andyapp.io)
Lead developer and person in charge of the support of two McDonald's projects (pidetufactura.mcdonalds.es and miturno.mcdonalds.es).
Assist support team with technical tickets.
Assisting in the selection process (technical part).
workExperienceContainer.message.dogfyDie: Dogfy diet is a B2C subscription of healthy dog food.
Development, maintenance and testing of the website (dogfydiet.com), the client area (app.dogfydiet.com), the internal CRM (sales.dogfydiet.com) and the internal back-office (bo.dogfydiet.com).
Code review (pull request from frontend and backend).
workExperienceContainer.message.filminDe: Filmin is a B2C video on demand platform.
workExperienceContainer.message.filminPa: Development, maintenance, documentation and testing of the main websites: (filmin.es, filmin.pt and filmin.cat).
CI/CD using GitLab pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
workExperienceContainer.message.kriterSo: Kriter is a B2B consultant that develops e-commerce for his clients.
Development and maintenance of e-commerce sites, providing customer support (example: gallissa.com).
Development and maintenance of the internal CRM (repcamp.com).
